.. _`samtools view`:

SAMTOOLS VIEW
=============

Convert or filter SAM/BAM.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule samtools_view:
        input:
            "{sample}.sam"
        output:
            "{sample}.bam"
        params:
            "-b" # optional params string
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-211-g6a5c5194/bio/samtools/view"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
